home.slogan: Get clients' feedback right in your store.
home.showoffDescription: Improve your business by collecting customers' feedback on whatever you ask for. It is as easy as scanning a QR code to open your questionnaires and answer them. We can also set NFC tags which open the questionnaires after a connection between them and a smartphone is made.
home.description: or ask your questions to support@uploy.app
home.primaryText: Log in with your Rate us business account

whatDoYouGetSeciton.title: What do you get?
advantages: Better overview of what your customers think for your business
The ability to preview if new changes are likable to to your customers
Honest feedback because all of your customers' answers are anonymous
Increase in sales if clients' feedback is important for you
Closer connection between you and the customer in which they feel as a participant in your business

columns.title: Signup
columns.description: You signup to the platform and we will activate your account ASAP if it meets our requirements.

columns.title: Subscription
columns.description: Log in to your dashboard and you can activate a subscription which you found suitable to your business.

columns.title: Live
columns.description: We will deliver all your QR code cards and NFC tags personally if you are based in Sofia, Bulgaria. If you are not located there, we will send you a pack of all the files needed to go live which you can print and put in a place where clients can see.

finalSection.title: Are you ready to improve your business?
finalSection.description: You can ask additional questions at support@uploy.app or by calling +359 882 764 107
finalSection.buttonText: Yes, I will not miss this opportunity!

description: By signing up you agree to our

signup.loginText: Click here if you have an account

info: If you have any questions, you can contact our support at

colorDropdown.title: Select brand color
colorDropdown.description: When people answer your questionnaires the page will have this brand color on all color-changing elements.

dashboard.warning: We recommend previewing the answers on a larger screen!
dashboard.pendingMessage: Your account is pending a quick review from our team. After we verify it, you can choose a subscription plan.
dashboard.errorCreating: There was an error creating the questionnaire! Try again or contact support.
dashboard.cannotActivate: Your questionnaire is not active because you have not activated a subscription!
maxQuestionnaires: Your subscription plan does not support more than

answer-questionnaire.error: There was an error submitting your answers! Please try again or contact support at support@uploy.app or by calling +359 882 764 107
answer-questionnaire.notFound: Questionnaire not found! If you think this is an error please contact us at support@uploy.app or by calling +359 882 764 107
answer-questionnaire.successDescription: We have sent your answers. Thank you, for your time!
answer-questionnaire.notActive: Unfortunately, this questionnaire is not active! Thank you for your time!

edit-questionnaire.notFound: Questionnaire not found! If you think this is an error please contact us at support@uploy.app or by calling +359 882 764 107
edit-questionnaire.error: There was an error updating your questionnaire! Try again or contact support at support@uploy.app or by calling +359 882 764 107
edit-questionnaire.success: Successfully updated the questionnaire! You will be redirected to Dashboard in 4s.
edit-questionnaire.errorNull: You cannot submit an empty question!

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.errorMessage: You must signup for a Uploy business account before accessing subscriptions page!

plans.cancelText: If you want to cancel or upgrade the subscription, contact us at support@uploy.app or call +359 882 764 107

pro.title: Pro
includes: AS many questionnaires as you want
QR code and NFC tag integration
Early access to new products and services

custom.title: Custom
custom.salesMessage: Contact sales at support@uploy.app or by calling to +359 882 764 107 or +359 895 703 556

return.title: Success!
return.description: Your subscription has been activated and you will be charged from tomorrow on! You can start using our services as of tomorrow! Enjoy your new business accession! If you have any questions, do not mind and contact us.

cancel.title: Canceled!
cancel.description: The process of activating your subscription was canceled. You can activate one by going to Dashboard by clicking the button below.
